name: Convert number array / auto-incremented numbers to JSON
description: Creates simple JSON, consisting of KEY: N pairs, where KEY is one of the specified string keys, N is the corresponding number from the passed array.

in_ports.name: input
in_ports.hint:
[Optional] Source numbers. Usually should be 1-column array; in another case, row/columns structure is ignored.
Can be skipped; then the numbers will be a simple arithmetic progression: see "Start value" and "Increment" parameters.

in_ports.name: keys
in_ports.hint: [Optional] List of JSON keys, separated by \n (name of every column in a separate line).

out_ports.name: json
out_ports.hint: Result JSON, combining the specified keys and numberic values

items.caption: Integer: double, rounded to the nearest long)
Boolean: true if â‰ 0, false if =0

controls.caption: Increment
controls.name: increment
controls.description: If the length (number of elements) of the source array is less than the number of specified keys, or if the source array is not set, the missed values for every key #K (K=0,1,2...) will be equal to start value + K * increment.
